title: Relentess
description: This is the third and final book in the Killer series.WARNING: THIS BOOK IS DISTURBING ON MANY LEVELS. THERE ARE SCENES INVOLVING HORROR, DUBIOUS CONSENT, RAPE AND BRUTAL TREATMENT. IF YOU HAVE TRIGGERS, THIS BOOK IS NOT FOR YOU. READ AT YOUR OWN RISK.M:What do you want to know?My family, they've abandoned me.My existence is stitched together by sin, regret and blood.This is my story.This is my salvation.This is a family's curse.Adriana:My soul is torn, my heart shattered.This isn't where I planned on ending up.I can't trust him, his intentions are not good.I cannot continue to be a pawn in a world of sin.
author: Bonny Capps
